alert.note: Alert for Northern Orange; Southern Newton; Southern Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:36PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana and eastern Orange Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 435 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Toomey, or near Orange. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange, West Orange, Vinton, Pinehurst, Hartburg, Forest Heights and Toomey. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 880 and 874. Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Orange; Southern Newton; Southern Orange
